archimate:BusinessService.name: Dunning
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Dunning / требовать уплаты просроченного долга
Example of use:
Handle the dunning process to resolution for a lapsed loan account General comment:
The dunning process is provided to recover loan accounts in the early stages of distress.
Business Purpose : Handle the dunning cycle for a loan account that is behind payments
Пример использования:
Обрабатывать процесс dunning для разрешения истекшего кредитного счета Общее замечание:
Процесс Даннинга предоставляется для восстановления кредитных счетов на ранних стадиях бедствия.
деловая цель ___Обрабатывать цикл требований уплатить для кредитного счета что за платежами___
Service Domain - Dunning The dunning/payment chasing process is provided to handle the initial response for loan accounts where one or more scheduled payments has been missed. The intent is to encourage the customer to make up missed payments so the loan facility can be restored to good standing. Failure can lead to restructuring and eventually recovery against the loan.
Detailed Summary This service domain handles the account chasing/dunning cycle for a loan account that is behind on scheduled payments
Executive Summary This service domain handles the account chasing/dunning cycle for a loan account that is behind on scheduled payments
Examples Of Use An overdue loan account is passed to the dunning/account chasing process where the customer is encouraged to catch up with payments
